why.title: Why #GameOverIsrael?
why.text: Israel is committing genocide and live streaming it to the world, yet they still play 'the beautiful game' against our national teams and in our stadiums.

ourDemands.title: The Demands
ourDemands.text: The heads of our Football Federations have the executive authority to issue a complete boycott of any team and any player.

CTA.title: Flood the Federation
CTA.text: Contact the representatives of your Football Federation and demand they take action.

callout: No more waiting. No more excuses. Boycott Israel now.

about.title: About
about.text: This campaign is powered by a coalition of ordinary people - organisers, activists, humanitarians and football fans - fighting for justice, accountability and freedom for Palestine.

call.title: Call your Federation Director
call.text: Tell your Federation Director to boycott the Israeli national team, Israeli clubs and ban Israeli players NOW.

downloads.title: Cover the Walls
downloads.text: Cover your city's walls with posters and stickers to make sure the Football Federation sees the boycott Israel demands EVERYWHERE.

infoLink.text: Everything you need to know about flyposting
